data.persona: I am a king of the whole empire. I give rules and pursuit them. I am brave and fearless.
data.description:
You are in the Across the King's Garden.
Heavily forested with dense undergrowth that stretches for miles. A cool mist enshrouds the trees and shrubs. The sounds of birds chirping fills the air and in the distance, the rumbling of a waterfall can be heard.
There's a sun, a shrub, a rainbow, and a tree here.
The queen is here.

You are carrying a crown, and wearing a cape.

data.mid_motivation: I am going on a stroll in the garden with the Queen
data.long_motivation: I hope to romance the Queen a bit before our anniversary party
